info.title: Order and Delivery Scheduling Templates
info.description: You use the Order and Delivery Scheduling Templates service to create, update and retrieve template data that is used to generate order and delivery schedules.

x-sap-shortText: Maintain template data that is used to generate order and delivery schedules.

post.summary: Create a single order and delivery scheduling template assignment.
tags: Order and Delivery Scheduling Template Assignments

requestBody.description: Order and Delivery Scheduling Template Assignments

400.description: Some of the data you provided is not allowed for this order and delivery scheduling template assignment. Provide consistent data for the new order and delivery scheduling template assignment to carry out this request.

403.description: You do not have the required authorization to carry out this request.

post.description:
To create an order and delivery template assignment using this request, you must first retrieve the ID of the order and delivery scheduling template you want to assign by using the appropriate API method. To assign order and delivery scheduling templates on scheduling group level, you must also retrieve the scheduling group ID through the Order and Delivery Schedules service.

You can create order and delivery template assignments on three different levels. For more information about how order and delivery template assignments are inherited to lower levels, see [Product Assistance for SAP Order and Delivery Scheduling](https://help.sap.com/docs/ORDER_DELIVERY_SCHEDULE_OD/30f4d620eb9e4cd2a7a603c4ac777a21/76fb320394d4456ca76508b31a1a465d.html?version=Cloud).

The validity start date must correspond with the first day of the week, and the validity end date must correspond with the last day of the week.

If more than one schedule type is enabled in the Manage Settings app, you must specify the schedule type to be used for the assignment. Depending on your configuration, available schedule type IDs are 00, 01, 02 and 03. The schedule type must match the schedule type of the order and delivery scheduling template you want to assign. If you do not provide a schedule type, the schedule type ID 00 is used to assign the order and delivery scheduling template.

To specify entire weeks without delivery dates/times, you can assign the preconfigured order and delivery scheduling template SAP1 using its ID d860a2d8-4a97-43e5-ace2-f711d6c97c5b. This order and delivery scheduling template can be assigned for all enabled schedule types. For more information, see [Delivery Template: No Planned Delivery](https://help.sap.com/docs/ORDER_DELIVERY_SCHEDULE_OD/30f4d620eb9e4cd2a7a603c4ac777a21/75a270bb2f24424995ca60377b4b1396.html?version=Cloud).

parameters.name: $select

403.description: You do not have the required authorization to carry out this request.

404.description: There is no order and delivery scheduling template assignment for the specified ID.

get.description: To carry out the request, you must specify the ID of the order and delivery scheduling template assignment you want to retrieve.

delete.summary: Delete a single order and delivery scheduling template assignment.
tags: Order and Delivery Scheduling Template Assignments

400.description: You cannot delete order and delivery scheduling template assignments if their validity lies in the past.

403.description: You do not have the required authorization to carry out this request.

404.description: There is no order and delivery scheduling template assignment for the specified ID.

412.description: Set the value of the 'If-Match' header to the '@etag' value of the order and delivery scheduling template assignment to carry out this request. To disable the etag validation for this request, specify '*' as the value of the 'If-Match' header.

428.description: Provide the 'If-Match' header and set its value to the '@etag' value of the order and delivery scheduling template assignment to carry out this request. To disable the etag validation for this request, specify '*' as the value of the 'If-Match' header.

delete.description: To carry out the request, you must specify the ID of the order and delivery scheduling template assignment you want to delete.

post.summary: Create a single order and delivery scheduling template.

400.description: Some of the data you provided is not allowed for this order and delivery scheduling template. Provide consistent data for the new order and delivery scheduling template to carry out this request.

403.description: You do not have the required authorization to carry out this request.

post.description:
If more than one schedule type is enabled in the Manage Settings app, you can use this request to create an order and delivery scheduling template of a specific schedule type. Depending on your configuration, available schedule type IDs are 00, 01, 02 and 03.

To create links between order and delivery scheduling templates of schedule type 00 and templates of other schedule types, you must first retrieve the IDs of the order and delivery scheduling templates you want to link to each other through the appropriate API method.
